snippet.title: The Restless Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Gameplay video for my short point and click horror, "The Restless"

Haunted by dark thoughts and tormented by the faces of past lovers, seek out the source of the darkness the holds you.
The Restless is a short point and click psychological horror game.

►Get the Game : http://gamejolt.com/games/the_restless/244489

►Twitter : https://twitter.com/Dansodic

►Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/dankennygamedesign

►Instagram: https://instagram.com/dansodic/

► Web: http://www.dankennygamedesign.com/
